# propagatesDeletesAtEndOfEvent

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that indicates whether the context propagates deletes at the end of the event in which a change was made.

## Declaration

```swift
var propagatesDeletesAtEndOfEvent: Bool { get set }
```

## Discussion

[doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true] if the receiver propagates deletes at the end of the event in which a change was made, [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false] if it propagates deletes only during a save operation. The default is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true].
title: propagatesDeletesAtEndOfEvent
